name: Addressbook
tagline: An address book web application powered by   php , postgreSQL and Apache(Win32)
body:
### Welcome to Address book.
A simple Web application tool to store your important addresses and phone numbers. This was developed and tested using Apache 2.2.22(Win32) , PHP 5.3.10, PostgreSQL 8.3

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Purpose
An application to enter persist your addresses and phone data in the database 

### Rather Drive Stick?
The documentation is not available at this moment. Please try to  use this application and and give me feedback and let me know if this works for you and if there are any issues in using let me know at the mail address below. 

### Authors and Contributors
You can @vbtamil mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. 

### Support or Contact
Contact vbtamil@yahoo.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
